example.name: Deposit USDC into Rings to Mint and Stake scUSD
example.description: When USDC is deposited in the market it is used to mint scUSD, staked and auto-compounds while collecting points. There is a 5-day redemption period for withdrawals, and the user will receive wstkscusd.

post.description: Get all markets. Use filters property in body to filter out by market id, chain id, etc. Since response is paginated, use pagination properties in body to get next page based on size property of page. Do note: max page size for response is 500.

data.name: Deposit USDC into Rings to Mint and Stake scUSD
data.description: When USDC is deposited in the market it is used to mint scUSD, staked and auto-compounds while collecting points. There is a 5-day redemption period for withdrawals, and the user will receive wstkscusd.

info.description: Rings will distribute a pro-rata share of 13,125 Gems between depositors on Royco and rings.money. Each $1 of liquidity into Rings receive 48 Rings Points.

marketType.title: Market Type
marketType.description: The type of market: 0 = Recipe, 1 = Vault

marketId.description: The on-chain identifier of the market: For recipe market, it's market hash -- for vault market, it's wrapped vault address

name.title: Name
name.example: Swap USDC to stkGHO for 1 mo

description.example: Swap USDC to stkGHO for 1 mo

underlyingVaultAddress.description: The address of the underlying vault -- only vault markets have an underlying vault, while recipe markets don't

frontendFee.title: Frontend Fee
frontendFee.description: The frontend fee for the market in basis points in wei: 10^18 = 100%

rewardStyle.title: Reward Style

variableYieldRate.description: Variable yield rate from the market which will change based on deposits
